name: LIGHTHOUSE - HELIGOLAND TALE
description:
LIGHTHOUSE is a black-and-white short story horror game

Story!
You are a fisherman, which was heading home, but suddenly a thick fog covered your sigh, and pushing through would be too dangerous, so you seek shelter on the Heligoland island where you are trying to find a signal to contact others for help.
You heard stories before about an island called Heligoland, a gigantic creature lurking somewhere near the lakes in Heligoland.

This game was inspired by the artwork from @Polm23
This game was created by @Kissing

Sidenote! 
This game was supposed to be a submission to "A Game By Its Cover 2021", but I did not have enough time nor the motivation to finish this game, but I found it too sad to just throw it away, so I redo the whole game from scratch. 

Check out my friend's amazing submissions!
Tenkaiyo - Devil Catcher
TrialityTom - Delivery Dispatch

Cover Image made by - Tenkaiyo
